claim: Recombinant HA antigens produced using BEVS have been shown to induce significantly higher levels of broadly cross-reactive antibodies against highly conserved regions of HA compared with egg-derived vaccines.
explanation: Multi-panel figure comparing immune responses to egg-adapted versus cell-grown vaccine viruses for four vaccine formulations (Fluzone IIV4, Fluarix IIV4, ccIIV4, RIV4) in two age groups (18–44 years: panels A and C; 45–64 years: panels B and D). Panels A and B show geometric mean ratios (egg/cell virus titer) at 1 month post-vaccination with 95% CIs for each vaccine component (A(H3N2), A(H1N1)pdm09, B/VIC, B/YAM). Panels C and D show pre- and post-vaccination proportions of subjects with ≥4-fold reduced titer to cell-grown virus. does not support the claim – the figure only presents comparisons of antibody titers against egg- versus cell-grown vaccine viruses and does not measure or demonstrate broadly cross-reactive antibodies against highly conserved HA regions. Note: No measurements of conserved-region cross-reactivity are provided; data focus solely on egg-adapted versus cell virus titer responses.

detailed_analysis.image_description: Multi-panel figure comparing immune responses to egg-adapted versus cell-grown vaccine viruses for four vaccine formulations (Fluzone IIV4, Fluarix IIV4, ccIIV4, RIV4) in two age groups (18–44 years: panels A and C; 45–64 years: panels B and D). Panels A and B show geometric mean ratios (egg/cell virus titer) at 1 month post-vaccination with 95% CIs for each vaccine component (A(H3N2), A(H1N1)pdm09, B/VIC, B/YAM). Panels C and D show pre- and post-vaccination proportions of subjects with ≥4-fold reduced titer to cell-grown virus.
detailed_analysis.reasoning: does not support the claim – the figure only presents comparisons of antibody titers against egg- versus cell-grown vaccine viruses and does not measure or demonstrate broadly cross-reactive antibodies against highly conserved HA regions.
detailed_analysis.confidence_notes: No measurements of conserved-region cross-reactivity are provided; data focus solely on egg-adapted versus cell virus titer responses.
